long description: Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 2 GB 2G/3G/4G Data & 1 GB 2G/3G/4G Data per Day for 4G Handset Only. (Voice & Data Validity for 4G Handset only 84 Days) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable.-- 2 GB 2G/3G/4G Data per Day -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 200 MB 2G/3G/4G data, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

For any customer found violating any of these conditions, the pack will be deactivated. Post customer will be charge 30p/min for free mins -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
